summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5741 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 9, Plat of Columbia, being the alley between Ferdinand Street and Edmunds Street, from 39th Avenue South to Ferdinand Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 75796, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
